オプション1:
Star Man woke up.
Several hours seemed to have passed.

(Ah... right. I came to an uninhabited island...
Is it evening? Or dawn?
My whole body hurts...)

Sunburn and muscle pain had left Star Man's body in tatters.
He mustered his will and stood up.
Star Man looked toward the sea.

(Yesterday rainwater had pooled among the rocks,
but it won't always be there... I have to think of something...
... I'll look for a river.)
Star Man looked around, but no river was in sight.
(I can see something like a path in the forest.)
Star Man decided to follow the path into the forest.
